Krisztián Hofstädter

funky flamingo workshop

An audio-video workshop for two members of the Cambridge based Funky Flamingo Club, an organisation for people with disabilities.

time:

tags: teaching, video, photo, DVD, accessibility

The project with Funky Flamingo consisted of 1) supervising Sammy’s and Mary-Ellen’s video production, 2) post production of their video draft, 3) artwork design and multiplication of DVD as well as 4) documenting a club-night with a photography.

tools: iMovie, Logic, Adobe Photoshop
